Reviews.Title: “The happiest of accidents...”
Reviews.Author: kinkythought
Reviews.Content: We ended up in One by the Five completely by accident -- a computer glitch with Jetsetter allowed us to book a room at the Seven when the hotel was actually full, so we were moved to the sister property. Even that experience was as I would expect a hotel to manage it -- when we arrived for check-in it was obvious there was some problem, but we were treated to complimentary breakfast, told to leave our things in the lobby, and assured that everything would be taken care of. When we came back in the evening, our luggage had already been moved and we were in for the best surprise of the trip! As others have mentioned One by the Five is a private apartment with an atmosphere fully devoted to love and romance. Possibly because we were staying in a 900+ Euro room that we'd only paid $150 Euros for, we didn't get the complimentary champagne and fruit, but it was nonetheless a treat. I can understand some of the complaints that the decor is just "too much"... I would definitely recommend One by the Five for a romantic getaway of 1 or 2 days, but it could be overkill for an extended period of time. However, our one night was so lovely and comfortable that we completely skipped the plans we'd made for the morning to stay in. The bed is without a doubt the most comfortable I've EVER slept (or done anything else) on. The only hitch was that once the hotel staff left after showing us how to use the ridiculously complicated TV-iPod-lighting room controls, we couldn't get any of it to work again, except the lighting after a whole lot of fiddling. But honestly, the point of One by the Five is NOT to watch satellite TV!

Reviews.Title: “Romantic Getaway”
Reviews.Author: JenMcTBrussels
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the One by the Five for two nights and had a lovely romantic break from the rest of life. The suite is part of a hotel however it is in a separate building and so you are completely left to your own devices - your only interruption will be your breakfast being delivered at a time of your convenience (TIP: Make sure you have already unwrapped the bath robes for when the door-bell rings as they will keep ringing and you will end up fighting with your bath-robe) :) One by the Five is designed to make you think about just the two of you and it really does achieve that well. From the champagne in the fridge, to your own private dance floor, to the cocktail receipes, to Edith Piaf and Barry White on the ipod (they have a really great selection of music tracks), to the bedroom and rain shower - it really is fabulous....and great fun. It is expensive at 940 Euros per night (includes breakfast, the champagne, the fresh fruit in the fridge, the spirits and bottles of water) but it was really worth it and if you want to treat your spouse/partner/partner to be to something special then this is something they won't forget. The staff were great, extremely welcoming and have great recommendations for local places in the Latin Quarter - they really help to make your visit perfect (thanks to all for such a great stay). .....and on final note, the bed is probably the most comfortable we have ever slept in...you never want to leave.

Reviews.Title: “One by The Five is an amazing experience”
Reviews.Author: NCRen
Reviews.Content: This suite is the thing of dreams. It is full of romance and personality. There are surprising accents galore. The vision in creating this experience is phenomenal. I highly recommend this suite for a truly romantic stay unlike anything else.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: europereisen
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent the best nights of our life in the One by the Five Hotel. The experience is so unique, so amazing... it looks like in a dream or a fairy tale. As soon as you enter in the lounge, the first impression is WOW! And you get in the bedromm, you say « Oh My God, how magnificent is it!!! » The One's interior decoration will you make serene and all your daily anxieties will definitely move away from you. You can admire the Parisian starry sky in privacy in your own bedroom, while you have the impression to float on your magic bed in weightlessness. The mattress is so comfortable: you could be unable to leave your room to visit the city. Personnel very professional Love feeling, love atmosphere, LOVE and romanticism: welcome to Paris, welcome to the One! You will LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: “Unique and amazing”
Reviews.Author: boubouLondon
Reviews.Content: We have tried quite few nice upscale hotels but this one is definitely worth trying. Behind an unappealing facade, start an amazing journey. In a typical parisian district, we felt far from everything. The One is THE place for couples looking for an escape, far from the reality of life, looking for complete privacy and above all an amazing experience. I can't say everything about this place as it has to be a bit of surprise, but let say it is the ideal place for a wedding proposal, for a honeymoon or just for a dirty weekend far far from the screaming kids. The design is great, the fittings are luxurious, the bed is a dream, everything has been created to create a one off experience. It is like being in your bubble, the two of you. and if you need a break, Paris is on your doorstep and its restaurants, bars, nightlife etc... So all in all we had an amazing time and we can only recommend this place for couples like us just looking to get away from it all. If you are looking for a hotel with a difference, this is definitely for you and you will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: “The most over-whelming suite experince imaginable!”
Reviews.Author: climber04
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed in the suite for 5 nights on the last stop of our honeymoon last June. The suite is beyond belief- eveyone that I have shown the pictures to cannot believe their eyes. For once, the pictures and hype are perfectly matched. Everything, from the fixtures to the materials was expertly chosen and carefully placed with both design and comfort in mind. Though we have stayed at many fine hotels, the memories that my wife and I share of this suite in particular will endure. Two bathrooms, a terrace, artwork, an excellent cound system, a rain shower, a plasma in the bathtub, the most comfortable bed in Paris, a kitchenette with espresso machine- the list goes on! Do yourself a favor and stay in this suite, if only for one night (but why not make it five ;)

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Romantic Magic Hotel !!!!”
Reviews.Author: vanessa_B050
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I spent the most beautiful night of the year in this lovely Hotel !!!! This is a unique experience, like a dream !!! The Suite is so nice, very well decorated, everything inside is made for love... I won't describe everything as it is better to discover and to be surprised .... I recommend to any in love couple to go there, you won't forget it !!! Service is perfect, and the breakfast is Fantastic :) Totally unforgettable...... Thanks to the One By the Five Hotel team !! ;)

Reviews.Title: “Amour....”
Reviews.Author: binbed
Reviews.Content: Absolutely Amazing!!!!!! This was all booked for me as a surprise. I walked in with no idea what to expect. Was a bit surprised when we were taken across the street from the hotel. I thought WOW as soon as Carine opened the door and led us in. The lounge, the artwork, the bathrooms, the dance floor and the BEDROOM had the overwhelming WOW factor. You want to touch everything and try everything out straight away. As soon as Carine left us to it, I jumped on the bed! The bedroom is magical. If you have this room, you don't want to explore the rest of Paris! A night under the stars in your own cloudy bedroom is heavenly. My partner surprised me by booking this suite and surprised me even further by proposing to me! An absolute must if you like the original, boutique, unique, sensual style in a hotel. I loved my experience and it will definitely be one I won't be forgetting. The complementary champagne/fruits and ingredients to make a love cocktail just adds to the many experiences of the 'Amour Apartement'....We're already planning to go back for our anniversary! I hope you all read this and decide to visit this beautiful place.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: caryso
Reviews.Content: My husband and I slept at the Five hotel in May, and at that time we had the chance to visit One by the Five, nicely proposed by the manager, Karine. We came back last week to try this exceptional one-room hotel… and we lived a fabulous experience. The check-in is at the Five Hotel, just across the street, and the receptionist brings you to One to explain some things: you can connect your iPod and have the music in the whole suite, you have a free Internet access, someone will bring you the breakfast tomorrow morning... Then the receptionist disappears and you stay with your lover in this suite dedicated to love and romance. We loved the dancing room, so original and so French, but also the little terrace with a big picture of Paris that makes you feel like on the ‘Pont des Arts’ bridge, ant the beautiful toilets with perfumes at your disposal. But the work of art is definitely the bedroom: is this room, nothing touches the ground, and all the elements are pure beauties. The bed is exceptional, big and extremely comfortable. The funniest touch is the webcam on top of the tv ;-), never seen before! I visited a lot of nice hotels but I will never forget this one…

Reviews.Title: “loved the unique experience”
Reviews.Author: lionTelAviv
Reviews.Content: I booked the new Suite recently launched by the Five Hotel called "ONE" by the Five through their website. I was looking for a unique birthday present for my loved one. It was just magic. A real high tech jewel with music through ipod everywhere, plasma tv connected to pc even in the bathroom, unique integrated light atmosphere, and the most confortable bed ever. I highly recommend it to couples looking for the exceptionnal night in Paris.

Reviews.Title: “Super”
Reviews.Author: Dicini
Reviews.Content: I never saw a hotel like that. This is something new and exciting. Our romantic week-end was top thanks to One by The Five! Plenty of space, star-lights, sensual atmosphere and huge floating bed – these things put you in a special mood. We didn’t want to go out)I liked the idea with ipod and tons of music on it, so that you can find anything you like (or put your own ipod) and listen to music in every room, in the bedroom, in the bathroom – cool! There’s also a dance floor. I think this is the perfect place to celebrate your marriage anniversary. Will tell my friends!

Reviews.Title: “I love it!”
Reviews.Author: jdaddyMoscow
Reviews.Content: I just recently stayed in The One by The Five hotel in Paris with my wife. We adored this hotel. It is very particular and different from others. First of all, it is situated in a nice quarter close to Saint Germain, very calm and pleasant. 7 minutes to go to Bd Saint Michel and Luxemburg Garden, 20 minutes of quiet walk to Notre Dame, at the same time we are far from the tourist crowd. Secondly, the service is attentive (we had fruits and a bottle of champagne for our arrival). And finally, the room was really top! In fact, there are several rooms and one bedroom with an enormous bed. The bed is made like a cloud in the night sky, so there are stars everywhere around and ambiance is tender. Will certainly come back to this hotel.

HotelInfo.Name: One by The Five
HotelInfo.Address: 3, rue Flatters, 75005 Paris, France
